enhanced_by.reason: The addRequiredOption method internally calls addOption to add the required option, indicating a strong state dependency.
The addRequiredOption method sets the option as required before adding it, which is a prerequisite for the method's functionality.
The getRequiredOptions method can be used to verify that the required option has been correctly added to the list of required options.
The hasOption method can be used to verify that the option has been added to the Options instance, which is a post-condition of addRequiredOption.
